messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6727047/diff/1/present/parse.go

http://codereview.appspot.com/6727047/diff/1/present/parse.go#newcode35
present/parse.go:35: // optional template function that is available inside templates as name.
s/as name/under that name/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5c56e29ab2e8&repo=talks ***

go.talks/present: address missed review comments

R=r
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 6727047: go.talks/present: address missed review comments
